Title: Habla, mudita
Writer: José Luis García Sánchez, Manuel Gutiérrez Aragón (screenplay), Manuel Gutiérrez Aragón (story)
Actors: José Luis López Vázquez, Kiti Mánver, Francisco Algora, Hanna Haxmann
Plot: Grandfather Ramiro is on vacation at a mountain inn in the company of his family. He decides to send his people to Madrid and stay in a shelter, saying that his health needs it. But the reason is another one.
